name: Elk Bugle & Elk Calls
description:
Elk bugle and elk calls with elk sounds perfect for elk hunting. Bluetooth compatible! The Elk bugle and elk calls app provides you REAL elk calls at your fingertips. These elk bugles & elk calls are clear, crisp and recorded from REAL elk. 10 unique elk sounds included. This is the best elk calls app you will find. Connect the app to your speaker and amplifier system to play the elk calls loud and use the elk calls to bring in elk.

FEATURES:
- 10 elk hunting calls including REAL elk sounds and REAL varmint sounds
- Effective, realistic and clear elk calls
- Bluetooth compatible to sync to a Bluetooth speaker to play the elk calls
- Elk hunting calls can play in the background of your phone allowing you to text, take pictures and surf the internet without disrupting the elk calls
- The soundtracks allow you to set the elk calls and focus on elk hunting
- Connect to your speaker system with audio cables or Bluetooth (cables not included)
- No more forgetting to grab your MP3 player or memory cards, you always have your phone with you
- E-Calling audio for elk calls at a fraction of the cost of purchasing multiple elk hunting sounds and memory cards separately

Soundtracks included in "ElkPro"
- Elk Bugle 1- Elk Call
- Elk Bugle 2 - Elk Call
- Elk Bugle 3- Elk Call
- Elk Quick Bugles
- Antler Rattle
- Elk Grunt 1 - Elk Call
- Elk Grunt 2 - Elk Call
- Elk Estrus - Elk Call
- Elk Chrip - Elk Call
- Elk Moan - Elk Calls

Download Elk Bugles & Elk calls and start having elk hunting success today!
